title: NFL Week 16 Picks, Kostos Returns! (Football 12/21)
description:
Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and R.J. White are joined by the one and only Nick Kostos to make picks for Week 16 of the 2018 NFL season. They break down every single game against the spread including their best bets: Chiefs-Seahawks (7:30), Giants-Colts (10:00), Texans-Eagles (12:15), Ravens-Chargers (15:45). They also hit on: Redskins-Titans (20:00), Falcons-Panthers (22:45), Vikings-Lions (27:00), why Nick is listening to his own wrestling podcast promos during another podcast (28:30), Bills-Patriots (30:00), Steelers-Saints (33:00), Bucs-Cowboys (36:15), Packers-Jets (38:40), Rams-Cardinals (40:30), Bengals-Browns (42:15), Broncos-Raiders (45:00), Jaguars-Dolphins (47:45), Bears-49ers (49:30) and the EXOTIC PLAYS OF THE WEEK (50:20).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
